Articles.Content:
Well, I will not abbandon it! Still working on Olmo's SOI and some terrain tweaks on the planets, since I learned a lot the past week as I was experimenting with planet PQS and height maps on my Kerbol Plus mod.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, some dwarf planets!

Minor issue I've found with OPM+ and Better Atmospheres:

I think it may have to do with the Better Atmospheres OP config I downloaded from Augustus, but I'm not sure.

This is the only planet affected by the glitch, which is a red pixelated halo that appears only at certain zooms, but quickly recedes behind the planet.

- - - Updated - - -

Question: which OP+ mod should we use, 1.7 or 2.3.5?

Edited April 2, 2015 by zilfondel

Question: which OP+ mod should we use, 1.7 or 2.3.5?

Both are broken and seemingly abandoned. I would use neither.
Use 2.3.5. This one is abandoned. The glitch with red halo is caused by a Kittopia Tech atmospheric mod bug. It was fixed in the newest version of pure Kopernicus.

Hello amarius1, I really recommend for you to revive this mod, as it is just amazing. I understand that you are currently revamping Kerbol Plus, but when you have the chance, you should work on this mod. Good luck!

Hello amarius1, I really recommend for you to revive this mod, as it is just amazing. I understand that you are currently revamping Kerbol Plus, but when you have the chance, you should work on this mod. Good luck!

Thank you but... OPM is already adding what this mod added, like, OPM already added moons to Urlum and Neidon... nope, not going to revive it...

@amarius1is this still being worked on? I could work on an update if you wanted

Edited October 22, 2018 by TheLoneMartian

On 10/22/2018 at 10:36 PM, TheLoneMartian said:

@amarius1is this still being worked on? I could work on an update if you wanted

Nope, the entire project concept evolved into Kerbol Origins but I also don't really have time to work on that anymore... You can continue this one if you wish.
